about_the_game:
Elemancer: Master the Elements, Save the Realm

Dive into the world of Elemancer, where your body becomes the conduit for elemental power! In this groundbreaking VR brawler, you'll harness the forces of nature to combat a rising darkness and restore balance to a world on the brink of chaos.

Become the Elemancer

As the chosen one with the spirit of fire burning within, you're tasked with an epic mission: free the trapped elemental spirits and thwart the nefarious plans of goblin hordes. Your journey will take you through breathtaking landscapes, from wind-swept peaks to treacherous goblin lairs.

Revolutionary Elemental Combat

  • Natural Movements: Unleash devastation with intuitive gestures. Punch, slash, and sweep to command the elements!
  • Five Elemental Forces: Master Fire, Water, Earth, Air, and Frost. Each element offers unique tactical advantages.
  • Dynamic Interactions: Witness the elements collide in spectacular fashion. Freeze foes with frost, then shatter them with earth attacks. Set enemies ablaze and watch the inferno spread with a gust of wind!

Innovate Your Fighting Style

  • Advanced Techniques: Learn intricate movements to unlock devastating elemental combos.
  • Custom Loadouts: Tailor your arsenal for every encounter. Mix and match elements for short-range barrages or long-distance strikes.
  • Skill-Based Mastery: Your real-world dexterity and creativity directly translate to in-game prowess. Become a true master of the elements!

A Living, Breathing Battlefield

  • Physics-Driven Combat: Enemies react realistically to your attacks. Toss goblins into each other, send them flying off cliffs, or pull them into your elemental maelstrom!
  • Dynamic Elemental Reactions: Chain elements for devastating effects! Create searing steam by dousing flames with water, or shatter frozen foes by combining frost, water, and earth. Every combination opens new tactical possibilities!

Epic Narrative Adventure

  • Compelling Storyline: Unravel the mystery behind the goblin invasion and the trapped spirits.
  • Diverse Challenges: Race against the wind, close dimensional rifts, and face off against goblin commanders in pulse-pounding boss battles.
  • Evolving Powers: Prove your worth to Esmire, Guardian of the Winds, and gain the ability to command the very air itself!

Elemancer isn't just a game—it's an elemental odyssey where YOUR movements shape the fate of worlds. Are you ready to master the elements and become the hero the realms need?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR: Meta Quest 2, Windows MR, Valve Index, HTC Vive
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700K equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR: Meta Quest 2, Windows MR, Valve Index, HTC Vive

short_description: Become a master of elements in Elemancer. Forge your unique combat style from hundreds of natural-motion attacks. Wield fire, water, earth, air, and frost to unleash devastating combos. Shatter frozen foes, summon searing steam, and manipulate physics in heart-pounding elemental battles.
